title: Industrial symphony no. 1: dream of the broken hearted
creator_credit: David Lynch, Angelo Badalamenti and Elbow Music
brief_description: Video of a performance featuring Julee Cruise singing the music of David Lynch and Angelo Badalamenti. The theme of the performance is the dreams a woman experiences after the man she loves leaves her. Julee Cruise portrays the woman in her dreams. Also stars Laura Dern and Nicolas Cage.
